name: Konseal Gore-Tex Fast & Light 2 Shoes - Men's

features: Vibram®  MegaGrip™ rubber compound is durable and grippy
Injected Eva Midsole delivers longwearing cushion and comfort
Gore-Tex provides waterproof and breathable performance
TPU film and midsole chassis elevate underfoot stability
Injected TPU 70 Shore D, Forefoot 1.8mm Non-Woven stiffener
Single layer mesh upper is lightweight, durable, and air-permeable
